item.title: How to add specs to your server
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

It took me about 2 hours to make specials for every dragon weapon, and the whip. Practically all you have to do is set the gfx for the weapon, and make the spec bar correctly.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add specs to your server

item.title: How to add specs to your server
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

[quote=“musicmad441, post:6, topic:144733”]Specs are very hard to add, they will take along time, try rune-server.

Musicmad441[/quote]

Not at all

Specials are easy, just add the filler methed, the refill, a special bar,
the specials int, and the weapons

Read full topic
